creator: Igor Chekachkov
caption: Diana moved from Kyiv with her boyfriend, who joined the army when they arrived to Lviv. Now she lives with her friends in the appartment in Lviv, and her boyfriend Nikolay visits her once a week. 10 years ago I started my “Daily Life” series, documenting how people share a common space. Today I continue to take photographs of people who was forced to leave their home because of russian invasion to Ukraine and now share the space with people who host them, as well as other displaced.
